targets.query:
boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| extend healthy = iff(machineHealth == 'Healthy',1, 0)  
| extend error= iff(machineHealth == 'Error',1, 0)  
| extend warning = iff(machineHealth == 'Warning',1, 0)  
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2)), healthyCount = sum(healthy), errorCount = sum(error), warningCount = sum(warning)
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)
| extend Availability = (healthyCount -  errorCount)*100/healthyCount  
| extend Performance = iff((healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount)>0,round(healthyCount*100/(healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount),2),0.00)
| extend OEE = (Performance+Quality+Availability)/3
| project OEE, ago(1m)

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2))
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)
| project Quality, ago(1m)

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| extend healthy = iff(machineHealth == 'Healthy',1, 0)  
| extend error= iff(machineHealth == 'Error',1, 0)  
| extend warning = iff(machineHealth == 'Warning',1, 0)
| summarize healthyCount = sum(healthy), errorCount = sum(error), warningCount = sum(warning)
| extend Performance = iff((healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount)>0,round(healthyCount*100/(healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount),2),0.00)
| project Performance, ago(1m)

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| extend healthy = iff(machineHealth == 'Healthy',1, 0)  
| extend error= iff(machineHealth == 'Error',1, 0)  
| extend warning = iff(machineHealth == 'Warning',1, 0)  
| summarize healthyCount = sum(healthy), errorCount = sum(error), warningCount = sum(warning)
| extend Availability = (healthyCount -  errorCount)*100/healthyCount  
| project Availability, ago(1m)

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)) by bin(messageTimestamp, 5m)
| project totalPartsMade = totalPartsMade, messageTimestamp
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| summarize defectivePartsMade = sum(defectivePartsMade) by bin(messageTimestamp, 5m)
| project defectivePartsMade, messageTimestamp
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| project temperature, messageTimestamp 
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| extend healthyCount = iff (machineHealth == 'Healthy' or machineHealth ==  'Warning', 1, 0), errorCount = iff (machineHealth ==  'Error', 1, 0)
| summarize upCount = sum(healthyCount), downCount = sum(errorCount) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1m)
| project messageTimestamp, upCount = iff(downCount == 0, 1, 0)
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| extend healthyCount = iff (machineHealth == 'Healthy' or machineHealth ==  'Warning', 1, 0), errorCount = iff (machineHealth ==  'Error', 1, 0)
| summarize upCount = sum(healthyCount), downCount = sum(errorCount) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1m)
| project messageTimestamp, downCount = iff(downCount > 0, 1, 0)
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| project temperature, messageTimestamp 
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| project temperature, messageTimestamp 
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp) 
| project oilLevel, messageTimestamp 
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| extend healthy = iff(machineHealth == 'Healthy',1, 0)  
| extend error= iff(machineHealth == 'Error',1, 0)  
| extend warning = iff(machineHealth == 'Warning',1, 0)  
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2)), healthyCount = sum(healthy), errorCount = sum(error), warningCount = sum(warning) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1h)
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)
| extend Availability = (healthyCount -  errorCount)*100/healthyCount  
| extend Performance = iff((healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount)>0,round(healthyCount*100/(healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount),2),0.00)
| extend OEE = (Performance+Quality+Availability)/3
| project OEE, messageTimestamp
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| project messageTimestamp, totalPartsMade
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(totalPartsMade) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1h)
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| project messageTimestamp, oilLevel
| summarize oilLevel = avg(oilLevel) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1h) 
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| project messageTimestamp, temperature
| summarize temperature = avg(temperature) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1h)
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where shiftNumber == tolong('$ShiftNumber')
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| extend healthy = iff(machineHealth == 'Healthy',1, 0)  
| extend error= iff(machineHealth == 'Error',1, 0)  
| extend warning = iff(machineHealth == 'Warning',1, 0)  
| summarize totalPartsMade = sum(round(totalPartsMade,2)), defectivePartsMade = sum(round(defectivePartsMade,2)), healthyCount = sum(healthy), errorCount = sum(error), warningCount = sum(warning) by bin(messageTimestamp, 1h), productionLine
| extend Quality = iff(totalPartsMade>0,(totalPartsMade -  defectivePartsMade)*100/totalPartsMade,0.00)
| extend Availability = (healthyCount -  errorCount)*100/healthyCount  
| extend Performance = iff((healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount)>0,round(healthyCount*100/(healthyCount + warningCount + errorCount),2),0.00)
| extend OEE = (Performance+Quality+Availability)/3
| project OEE, productionLine, messageTimestamp
| order by messageTimestamp asc

boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where $__timeFilter(messageTimestamp)
| summarize partsMade = sum(totalPartsMade) by productionLine, bin(messageTimestamp, 5m)
| project messageTimestamp, productionLine, partsMade
| order by messageTimestamp asc

list.definition:
boltmaker
| where messageTimestamp > ago(7d)
| project  PlantName = plantName
| distinct PlantName
| where PlantName != 'null'
| order by PlantName asc
list.label: Plant
list.name: PlantName
list.query:
boltmaker
| where messageTimestamp > ago(7d)
| project  PlantName = plantName
| distinct PlantName
| where PlantName != 'null'
| order by PlantName asc

list.definition:
boltmaker
| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where messageTimestamp > ago(7d)
| project  ProductionLine = productionLine
| distinct ProductionLine
| where ProductionLine != 'null'
| order by ProductionLine asc
list.label: Production Line
list.name: ProductionLine

| project  ProductionLine = productionLine

| where ProductionLine != 'null'
| order by ProductionLine asc

list.definition:

| where plantName == '$PlantName'
| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
| where messageTimestamp > ago(7d)
| project  ShiftNumber = tostring(shiftNumber)
| distinct ShiftNumber
| order by ShiftNumber asc

list.query:

| where productionLine == '$ProductionLine'
